 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/cfcb2f65-440b-401e-f25c-7e0f1e2bc026.jpeg> 	
The Retail Academy is bringing learning straight to our stores with the launch of the On-the-Job Training (OJT) Programme! This hands-on initiative empowers retail teams with practical skill-building, guided roleplays, and real-time feedback all delivered in-store by expert trainers. Get ready to elevate performance and enhance customer experiences like never before!

<https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/cfcb2f65-440b-401e-f25c-7e0f1e2bc026.jpeg> 	
The Retail Academy is bringing learning straight to our stores with the launch of the On-the-Job Training (OJT) Programme! This hands-on initiative empowers retail teams with practical skill-building, guided roleplays, and real-time feedback all delivered in-store by expert trainers. Get ready to elevate performance and enhance customer experiences like never before! 	
Learn more! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=ce2fdaedf4&e=0385dbee45>  	
	

THE CHANGE PLAYBOOK PROGRAMME


Two workshops from the new â€˜Change Playbookâ€™ programme were delivered to the Transform team. This programme introduces a structured Change Management model and practical tools to help the team navigate transitions effectively, addressing both the people and process aspects of change. A bespoke case study, designed to reflect real-life scenarios similar to Chalhoub Groupâ€™s current setup, provided participants with valuable context and practical application.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/1e4f9fc8-ec92-d8b1-2b4e-ef4fd63160f6.jpg> 	
	

BUILDING OUR BEAT : FASHION DIVISION OFFSITE

Two workshops from the new â€˜Change Playbookâ€™ programme were delivered to the Transform team. This programme introduces a structured Change Management model and practical tools to help the team navigate transitions effectively, addressing both the people and process aspects of change. A bespoke case study, designed to reflect real-life scenarios similar to Chalhoub Groupâ€™s current setup, provided participants with valuable context and practical application.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/1e4f9fc8-ec92-d8b1-2b4e-ef4fd63160f6.jpg> 	
	

BUILDING OUR BEAT : FASHION DIVISION OFFSITE


The Fashion Division came together for an electrifying offsite, celebrating 2024â€™s achievements and setting bold ambitions for 2025. With inspiring insights from Michael Chalhoub, Patrick Chalhoub, David Vercruysse and Grace Khoury, the focus was clearâ€”resilience, collaboration, and customer excellence to win the future. From honoring our A.C.E. achievers to wrapping up with a silent disco, the energy was unstoppable!

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/aaf86bd7-5283-0f5b-3075-bf27873604e2.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/fefd0336-c189-df1d-de00-087a5e5f2f04.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/32ac06c0-512b-97bf-9664-b02353c47bb5.jpg> 	
	

INTELLIGENCE TEAM ALIGNMENT

<https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/aaf86bd7-5283-0f5b-3075-bf27873604e2.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/fefd0336-c189-df1d-de00-087a5e5f2f04.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/32ac06c0-512b-97bf-9664-b02353c47bb5.jpg> 	
	

INTELLIGENCE TEAM ALIGNMENT


The Intelligence Team alignment focused on a deep dive into their 3-year strategy, outlining key priorities and the roadmap to achieving them. The session explored the team's strengths, collaboration opportunities, and the capabilities needed to drive impact. The alignment concluded with an engaging GenAI activity, where the team envisioned the future of Intelligence and innovative possibilities for growth.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/15a8e9b6-ac3e-5fbf-32ab-417d5babe166.jpg> 	
	

LEADING TEAMS BREAKTHROUGH EXPERIENCE


The Leading Teams journey kicked off with an unforgettable Breakthrough Experience at Aventura Adventure Park. This event encouraged participants to step outside their comfort zones, overcome self-imposed limitations, and embrace vulnerability, all while fostering trust through engaging and challenging team building activities.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/c9aa3194-a185-9801-6f07-8ceff9122fde.jpg> 	
	

ALLIED BEAUTY TEAM ALIGNMENT

The Leading Teams journey kicked off with an unforgettable Breakthrough Experience at Aventura Adventure Park. This event encouraged participants to step outside their comfort zones, overcome self-imposed limitations, and embrace vulnerability, all while fostering trust through engaging and challenging team building activities.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/c9aa3194-a185-9801-6f07-8ceff9122fde.jpg> 	
	

ALLIED BEAUTY TEAM ALIGNMENT


The Retail Academy partnered with Allied Beauty, delivering an impactful learning experience focused on collaboration, innovation, and ownership. Through an engaging Insights Discovery workshop, strengths were explored, teamwork was enhanced, and communication was improved. A dynamic team-building activity further reinforced the eventâ€™s theme, encouraging creative thinking and ownership in a collaborative setting.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/77dd5e71-6ba3-54b4-5083-18b3e4a8839a.jpg> 	
	

ALIGN & ASPIRE TEAM BUILDING WORKSHOP


We had an amazing Align & Aspire Teambuilding workshop with our Bangalore-based team members! It was truly inspiring to see everyone unite, engage in insightful discussions, and participate in the activities with such enthusiasm. A big thank you to the Digital HR â€“ HRIS, HRMS, and Payroll teams for their energy and active involvement!

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/c79007db-2a60-fc9d-8a89-8a2d211e4a37.jpeg> 	
	

UAE COUNTRY MANAGEMENT LEADERSHIP ASSIMILATION WORKSHOP

We had an amazing Align & Aspire Teambuilding workshop with our Bangalore-based team members! It was truly inspiring to see everyone unite, engage in insightful discussions, and participate in the activities with such enthusiasm. A big thank you to the Digital HR â€“ HRIS, HRMS, and Payroll teams for their energy and active involvement!

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/c79007db-2a60-fc9d-8a89-8a2d211e4a37.jpeg> 	
	

UAE COUNTRY MANAGEMENT LEADERSHIP ASSIMILATION WORKSHOP


We hosted the Leadership Assimilation workshop, bringing the Country Management team together for a powerful session of reflection, alignment, and connection. This workshop created a space for open dialogue, deeper team bonding, and a shared vision for success. With an emphasis on genuine collaboration, it reinforced the importance of unity in leadership driving towards greater impact and growth.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/e3b24467-0a6a-cb2a-eb0e-7f6fcc5bea8d.jpg> 	
	

FACES STRATEGY WORKSHOP


The FACES Team Alignment in Jeddah brought together store managers from Egypt, KSA, and the UAE for a three-day immersive experience. Kicking off with a teambuilding day in the desert, the event fostered connection through activities, an awards ceremony, and key business updates. The following days focused on strategy-building, strengthening collaboration, and aligning the team on a shared vision for growth.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/74ae7b59-a39f-992e-528c-28475ac3da72.jpg>
